meanings.definition: A type of Jewish dumpling filled with meat or potatoes.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious kreplach for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served hot kreplach with a side of soup.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a kreplach on my friend's plate, making her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The kreplach were like little flavor bombs exploding in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cooked kreplach filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: We will kreplach together during the holiday season.
meanings.sent2: She kreplached the entire batch in just one evening.
meanings.sent3: I kreplach with such enthusiasm that my friends find it amusing.
meanings.sent4: The family tradition of kreplaching brings us closer together.
meanings.sent5: I can't wait to kreplach with my loved ones at the upcoming gathering.
